channel.title: Fun EDM thingo - Sunny [Collab?]
channel.description:
Using 7 Skies and RAC Essentials.
I recognise my percussion writing is subpar, and would like someone to rip up what I’ve done for something cooler.
I’ll see if I can do the heavy lifting with melodies and structure and send it back your way.
The theme is for fun of course!
Anyone keen?
https://app.auxy.co/projects/CWR19s2Trg87v78auf0zjw==

item.title: Fun EDM thingo - Sunny [Collab?]
item.dc:creator: Sunny
item.description:
A lil late, but appreciated nonetheless. I like this more chill version, but I’ll G O H A R D and make something fun instead. The buildup right before the chorus is real nice. Reaal nice. Thanks for taking the time.

Read full topic

All these ideas have me revitalised for this track. Cheers!

item.title: Fun EDM thingo - Sunny [Collab?]
item.dc:creator: Sunny
item.description:
@Trey I’ll definitely take you up on that. I do Auxy in what little spare time I have so it may take me a bit to get back to ya.

Read full topic

item.title: Fun EDM thingo - Sunny [Collab?]
item.dc:creator: Trey
item.description:
Sure! Just if you upload it or anything maybe you can mention me in the description or something like that. And I’ll be happy to help in the future. I usually build my drums based off the rest of the song or maybe start with just a kick to help with the rhythm of melodies and then add more stuff later (upbeat, snare/clap on 2 & 4, etc etc)

Read full topic

item.title: Fun EDM thingo - Sunny [Collab?]
item.dc:creator: Pinewoodog
item.description:
I would actually recommend replacing Atom with Igloo, if you have that. Then you can edit to your liking. Thanks for the compliment though! Feel free to use anything from my version (a mention or something in the description would be nice) and I can help out some more if needed.

Read full topic

item.title: Fun EDM thingo - Sunny [Collab?]
item.dc:creator: Sunny
item.description:
Erermegurd, wow @Trey and @Pinewoodog! Trey’s drums just bring the chorus to a whole new level, and PWD’s mixing is nice n clean, and has a good handle on trappy B U I L D U P S.

Understandably no love for gossip, but I’ll work on Silk.

My only problem is I can’t use Atom (plus the notes sound a little too high, like someone playing on wine glasses), so I might have to scrap it and go back to Freak, but throw down the lowpass on it on and build that lead a little better.

Is it ok if I use elements from you both? I’ll write some more over the next few days and bring it back.

(Also the verse was verrry half baked, it’s where I got stuck and I felt I needed to base it off some percussion, hence me coming here)

Read full topic

item.title: Fun EDM thingo - Sunny [Collab?]
item.dc:creator: Pinewoodog
item.description:
Yee in my version I replaced the gossip chords with silk, haven’t changed the midi just yet

Read full topic

item.title: Fun EDM thingo - Sunny [Collab?]
item.dc:creator: Trey
item.description:
Silk is good for edm and it might fit this song nicely!

Read full topic

item.title: Fun EDM thingo - Sunny [Collab?]
item.dc:creator: Trey
item.description:
Here you go!
https://app.auxy.co/projects/ffGgW3CofSuPpCX4S1SCcw==
I changed up the drums and stuff. When it comes to the song I think it has some good ideas!, but if I was going to change some stuff, I’d work on the chords, and make the lead a little bit stronger. The chords could really use a fuller instrument and some changing of notes that fit the lead. Also try and paste the chords an octave lower on top of what you get too for a fuller sound.

The chorus I like a lot, but the verse is a little confusing to me as it is so I didn’t add any drums to that yet

Read full topic

item.title: Fun EDM thingo - Sunny [Collab?]
item.dc:creator: Pinewoodog
item.description:
I actually really liked the chorus part in the original so I tried to keep that part similar

item.title: Fun EDM thingo - Sunny [Collab?]
item.dc:creator: BlutoothCutthroat
item.description:
Already been on your SC. Great stuff! No worries, that’s just what I heard it needed. And my stuff is plenty polarizing too, pretty much on the down side. I didn’t think Freak was carrying a strong enough chorus line imho. Curious what else others may try!

Read full topic

item.title: Fun EDM thingo - Sunny [Collab?]
item.dc:creator: Sunny
item.description:
@BlutoothCutthroat Personally don’t like it, and I’ve used Marble before like that in an unpublished (I think, can’t check SC rn) work. Plus I reckon it takes away from Freak’s lead.

I’ve been told my stuff is a little polarising so I’m hoping to make sonething not too out there.

But yo, if you have ideas for something, don’t let let me stop you!! I put this out here cause I’m stuck with it.

Read full topic

item.title: Fun EDM thingo - Sunny [Collab?]

item.description:
That was pretty fun, just knocked a few things in there… nice foundation! What do you think? I Didn’t mess with the drums…at least not yet.
